title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, October 8, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of R.L. Stein (1943), author of the horror series for children “Goosebumps” and the “Fear Street” series for young adults.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of R.L. Stein (1943), author of the horror series for children “Goosebumps” and the “Fear Street” series for young adults.
